anmf.title: Angular NgRx Material Fire
anmf.about.get-notified.description: a Twitter bot that helps you to stay up to date with releases of popular frontend frameworks & libraries!

anmf.features.title: Features
anmf.features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
anmf.features.ngrx: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
anmf.features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
anmf.features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
anmf.features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
anmf.features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos
anmf.features.themes: Flexible theming support for provided and custom components
anmf.features.themes.title: Themes
anmf.features.lazyloading: Faster startup time with lazy loaded feature modules
anmf.features.lazyloading.title: Lazy loading
anmf.features.cypress: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web.
